title: rs.WindowPick is incredibly slow vs Rhino.WindowPick = instant
question:
I’m rewriting our rhinoscript in python and I stumbled upon this.


import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

AllPD = rs.WindowPick((-140,-190,0),(99999,-99999,0), None, False, False)








https://global.discourse-cdn.com/mcneel/uploads/default/original/3X/0/6/06a45ef22aee20d03aa0c9611c3fcee5e40a63dc.mp4






image
1810×1056 19.9 KB

code_blocks.code:
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
import time

st=time.time()
AllPD = rs.WindowPick((0,0,0),(700,700,0), None, False, False)
et=round(time.time()-st,3)
print "{} objects found.  Elapsed time={} sec".format(len(AllPD),et)
code_blocks.author: Helvetosaur
